fileheader.filedesc: Functions to access generic data files.
fileheader.constant: // can specify only one of the following:

function.name: CreateDataFile
function.explain: filespec is in normal package descriptor format. 'filename' or '::filename' will create the new data file /data/ds/filename. ':pkgname:filename' will create /data/ds/pkgname/filename.
flags specifies if the keys of the new datafile are strings OR integers.
function.return: DataFile Reference. See the DataFile object documentation.

function.name: OpenDataFile
function.explain: filespec is in normal package descriptor format. 'filename' or '::filename' will open the data file /data/ds/filename. ':pkgname:filename' will open /data/ds/pkgname/filename.
function.return: DataFile Reference. See the DataFile object documentation.

function.name: UnloadDataFile
function.explain: filespec is in normal package descriptor format. 'filename' or '::filename' will unload the data file /data/ds/filename. ':pkgname:filename' will unload /data/ds/pkgname/filename.

function.name: ListDataFiles
function.explain: Returns an array of structs containing:
.pkg - name of the package the datafile belongs to
